scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: shanghao
scrape.text:
Tightly written with a subversive take on the good guys and the not so good guys.
It's good but not a story I'm very fond of I'm afraid.
In a Nutshell The truth hurts. Trying to be true brings pain. Ignorance is bliss. What happens in the family stays in the family.
Oh. And don't bother with posh pretentious rip-offs of a restaurant such as those similar to the venue of the dinner.
